author: Philip Bromwell
title: Beaumont medics improvise to lift patients' spirits
description: Doctors and nurses treating Covid-19 patients at Beaumont Hospital in Dublin are sticking print-outs of their faces to their personal protective equipment (PPE).
content:
Doctors and nurses treating Covid-19 patients at Beaumont Hospital in Dublin are sticking print-outs of their faces to their personal protective equipment (PPE).
They say the initiative, which started earlier this week, is a way of allowing patients to see t… [+1181 chars]
